metadata.title: Amigo Bug Rug Fly Sheet
features: Supersized tail flap, front leg arches ,shoulder and mane lining.
Classic front closure and cross surcingles.
Removable neck cover for greater coverage when grazing.
Silver color to reflect sunlight providing 65% UV protection.
description: Horseware Amigo Bug Rug Fly Sheet Knitted polyester fabric is soft, absorbent and strong with sun reflecting properties. Detach-a-Neck fly sheet is breathable with UV protection that prevents bleaching or the coat and protects from harmful UV rays. Features: Detachable Neck Classic Front Closure Cross Surcingles Shoulder and Mane Lining Front Leg Arches Light coloring to reflect sunlight Item Specifications: Material: Polyester
